channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:35 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:35 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Кировоградська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!

item.title: 🔴 21:58 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
